programme.title: Days Of Thunder
programme.desc: A hotshot stock car racer finds more than fame in the south - love for a neurosurgeon who has a marked disdain for racing.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A pampered actor and his co-stars become part of a real war in a Southeast Asian jungle.

programme.title: The Kid Detective
programme.desc: A once-celebrated kid detective, now 31, continues to solve the same trivial mysteries until a client brings him his first 'adult' case - to find out who brutally murdered her boyfriend.

programme.title: Vacancy
programme.desc: A couple stuck at a secluded motel see that several video cameras are attached to their room. They realise that unless they flee, they will become the next victims of a snuff film.

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: Al Pacino and Johnny Depp head an all-star cast in this brilliant gangland thriller about an undercover FBI agent who befriends a hitman to gain entry to the mob.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Life is a sci-fi thriller about an International Space crew whose mission turns to one of primal fear after discovering a terrifying life form.

programme.title: Takers
programme.desc: Matt Dillon, Idris Elba, Paul Walker and Hayden Christiansen star in this action-packed thriller full of twists and turns.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Enter a universe where more than one wears the mask.

programme.title: Vacancy
programme.desc: A couple stuck at a secluded motel see that several video cameras are attached to their room. They realise that unless they flee, they will become the next victims of a snuff film.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: After his partner Tom Wynne and family are killed by the infamous and elusive assassin Rogue (Jet Li), FBI agent Jack Crawford (Jason Statham) becomes obsessed with revenge as his world unravels into a vortex of guilt and betrayal.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Life is a sci-fi thriller about an International Space crew whose mission turns to one of primal fear after discovering a terrifying life form.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2 - The Monster Of Maeshowe
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota travel to the island of Orkney and enter the lair of the legendary Hogboy to investigate a case of Viking treasure, lust, and madness.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2 - Isle Of The Druids
programme.desc: Were Druids prehistoric hippies or bloodthirsty practitioners of human sacrifice? To find out, Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota explore Anglesey, consider cannibalism, and face the fiery Wicker Man.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China - Celebrating Lantern Festival In Beijing
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in his mum's home town of Beijing to begin a culinary, historical and personal journey through the ancient country of China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China - The Simple Life In Anhui
programme.desc: Adam visits the beautiful, mountainous province of Anhui, home to one of the eight great regional cuisines of China. Anhui cuisine is hearty, peasant food that uses seasonal, wild produce from the mountains.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China - Centuries Of Sophisticated Cuisine In Jiangsu
programme.desc: Adam's journey to explore China's history through its food continues, as he visits the provinces of Jiangsu and Zhejiang, both considered part of the 8 great regional cuisines of China and celebrated for their wealth and sophistication.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China - Shanghai
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the largest cities in the world Shanghai where he discovers a modern, cosmopolitan and global facing city.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP1
programme.desc: California has one of the largest populations of Japanese people in America. Their life here and their transition into American culture hasn’t been a smooth one. In this episode we uncover their trials, resilience and delicious healthy food.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP2
programme.desc: California was once called Mexico before the United States purchased it. In San Diego we eat the real Mexican food from those who do it best. And we go on a beer tour and taste the best craft beers money can buy.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP3
programme.desc: Miami is not just close to Cuba in proximity but the real Cuban food here is plentiful. We meet the Cubans who know the real Cuba and find out how their life here in Miami is so sweet.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP4
programme.desc: It is estimated that as many as 4.5 million Irish arrived in America between 1820 and 1930. They left their mark on the founding formation of America and we find out more about their history as we eat their food.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP1
programme.desc: California has one of the largest populations of Japanese people in America. Their life here and their transition into American culture hasn’t been a smooth one. In this episode we uncover their trials, resilience and delicious healthy food.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2 - Queens Of The Screen
programme.desc: Meet three actresses who became real-life princesses. Follow Grace Kelly, Gloria Swanson, and Rita Hayworth on their rise from Hollywood royalty to members of European nobility, which brought unparalleled glamour to the aristocracy.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2 - Queens Of Culture
programme.desc: Meet the “Queens of Culture”: three empowered American princesses who blazed trails through the international arts world. See how Winnaretta Singer, Sara Murphy, and Peggy Guggenheim inspired some of the most innovative artists of the 20th century.

programme.title: Adele: A New Chapter
programme.desc: Adele is a 15-time Grammy Award-winning artist whose soulful sound has thrust her into the limelight. Through her own words, video and live performances, take an incredible look at the life and times of one of the greatest artists of all time.

programme.title: Beyonce & Jay-Z: Power Love
programme.desc: A merger of megastar music. Discover the true story of multi-genre performer and fashion promoter, Beyonce Knowles and the world's first hip hop billionaire, Jay-Z.

programme.title: Tom Hanks: The Nomad
programme.desc: From humble beginnings to an aspiring thespian to acting as some of the world’s most iconic and notable characters. He has picked up a reputation as ‘America’s Nice Guy’, ’The Everyman’ and a nomad of the arts. But we all know him… as Tom Hanks.

programme.title: Brad Pitt: Breaking Hollywood
programme.desc: He may be one of the sexiest Hollywood actors, but his career and personal goals offer much more than his looks. Brad Pitt. One of the leading names in all of Hollywood. The well-known story of an unknown talent who transformed into a superstar.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: It is spring, and migrating ospreys return to the park. Pregnant red deer come down from the mountain tops to the lowlands to calve. On a mountainside, two big cocks fight for the right to mate in a spectacle called a lek.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: It is now June, and the park is bathed in 17 hours of daylight. With the warm temperatures come rich pickings, but for the newborn the summer months are crucial as they learn to fight, find food and avoid predators.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Feed The Zoo
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Giant Wetapunga Wild Work
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, the Ungulate team prepare for a birth, we meet one of the longest living animals and Auckland Zoo helps to save an endangered giant.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Saving The Kakapo
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, it's an anxious time for Zoo vets as they work to save one of the most endangered birds on the planet, and the ectotherm team are on a mission in the wild South Island.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Orangutan Baby Birth
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s primate team prepare to welcome a new birth.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Hiding In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Chasing Colour
programme.desc: Find out the stories behind the scientific research on animal colors - from robotic frogs wrestling with real-life counterparts, to spiders wearing eyeliner to attract mates.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands - Breeding Season
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands - Rivalry Time
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Myth & Reality
programme.desc: Dogs in New Zealand can detect human emotions? A pet miniature Schnauzer can predict someone's death? How do dogs really communicate with each other?

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Crucial Hearing
programme.desc: A Jack Russell Terrier barks when he ears the unique sound of a life threatening occurrence. How are dogs trained to provide assistance? Amos, trained by Hearing Dogs for Deaf People UK helps his owner through some difficult times.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Above And Beyond Loyal
programme.desc: Amy Rouse and her Border Collie Mist trains for the English National Sheepdog Trials. Quebec's MIRA foundation provides assistance dogs for children with autism. Buddy, a hero dog, guides an Alaskan State Trooper to his owner's workshop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - The Mystery Of Healing Part 2
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: Bornean Elephants
programme.desc: The documentary takes the perspective of Bornean elephants in Sabah as they traverse through the landscape and show how these gentle giants can coexist with humans amidst different challenges faced.

programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, who had left his Jaeger training midway, gets a chance to live up to his father's legacy as he teams up with his estranged sister and former co-pilot to stop a new Kaiju threat.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP3
programme.desc: Miami is not just close to Cuba in proximity but the real Cuban food here is plentiful. We meet the Cubans who know the real Cuba and find out how their life here in Miami is so sweet.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP4
programme.desc: It is estimated that as many as 4.5 million Irish arrived in America between 1820 and 1930. They left their mark on the founding formation of America and we find out more about their history as we eat their food.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel - The Challenge And UK
programme.desc: Manu Feildel has a dream to follow in the footsteps of Jules Vernes’ Around the World in 80 days. So Manu sets himself a challenge to circumnavigate the world, through his food loving eyes. Will he make it? First stop - London.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel - Dubai And The Desert
programme.desc: Manu arrives in Dubai after London and is quick to dig up as much culinary experience in Dubai so he sets off to the spice souk, fish markets and a local pastry kitchen.

programme.title: Mystic Britain - Secrets Of Stonehenge
programme.desc: Clive Anderson tries to unlock the secrets behind one of Britain’s greatest ancient monuments: Stonehenge.

programme.title: Mystic Britain - Time Tripping
programme.desc: Television and radio presenter Clive Anderson and anthropologist Mary-Ann Ochota explore the island’s ancient places and rituals. Visit Stonehenge, Hadrian’s Wall, and other sacred British sites to unlock the secrets of the ancient Britons.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2 - Lost Tribe Of Scotland
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota try to find out why an ancient warrior tribe mysteriously vanished - and uncover an epic tale of Vikings, giants, and the Loch Ness Monster.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2 - Mystery Of The White Horse
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary Ann Ochota explore a mysterious giant hill figure and get drawn into ancient myths, local folklore, and pagan rituals. Who put it there and why?

programme.title: Into The Cosmos: The Space Race, Mars And Beyond
programme.desc: A look at the development of space travel and the potential for humans to one day walk on the surface of Mars.

programme.title: Black In Space: Breaking The Color Barrier
programme.desc: The Civil Rights Movement collided with the Space Race as America battled to beat the Soviets to become the first nation to send a black astronaut into orbit.

programme.title: Shuttle Discovery's Last Mission
programme.desc: Celebrate the remarkable past of the Discovery space shuttle before it embarks on its final flight. Witness the emotionally charged mission, and see if this robust but fragile aircraft makes it to Washington, D.C.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2 - Aquarius Reef Base
programme.desc: The worldwide pandemic ceased operations on the world's only underwater habitat. Mike Davidson joins a crack repair crew as they dive in to bring it back to life and get NASA astronauts back inside for training.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2 - Super Stallion Helicopter
programme.desc: Mike Davidson joins the US Marines' 'Heavy Haulers' squadron as they're put to the test. They battle to keep their fleet of CH53 'Super Stallion' choppers flying, in preparation for intense warfare training exercises in the desert and mountains.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands - Breeding Season
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands - Rivalry Time
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Myth & Reality
programme.desc: Dogs in New Zealand can detect human emotions? A pet miniature Schnauzer can predict someone's death? How do dogs really communicate with each other?

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Crucial Hearing
programme.desc: A Jack Russell Terrier barks when he ears the unique sound of a life threatening occurrence. How are dogs trained to provide assistance? Amos, trained by Hearing Dogs for Deaf People UK helps his owner through some difficult times.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Above And Beyond Loyal
programme.desc: Amy Rouse and her Border Collie Mist trains for the English National Sheepdog Trials. Quebec's MIRA foundation provides assistance dogs for children with autism. Buddy, a hero dog, guides an Alaskan State Trooper to his owner's workshop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - The Mystery Of Healing Part 2
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: Bornean Elephants
programme.desc: The documentary takes the perspective of Bornean elephants in Sabah as they traverse through the landscape and show how these gentle giants can coexist with humans amidst different challenges faced.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China - Celebrating Lantern Festival In Beijing
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in his mum's home town of Beijing to begin a culinary, historical and personal journey through the ancient country of China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China - The Simple Life In Anhui
programme.desc: Adam visits the beautiful, mountainous province of Anhui, home to one of the eight great regional cuisines of China. Anhui cuisine is hearty, peasant food that uses seasonal, wild produce from the mountains.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China - Centuries Of Sophisticated Cuisine In Jiangsu
programme.desc: Adam's journey to explore China's history through its food continues, as he visits the provinces of Jiangsu and Zhejiang, both considered part of the 8 great regional cuisines of China and celebrated for their wealth and sophistication.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China - Shanghai
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the largest cities in the world Shanghai where he discovers a modern, cosmopolitan and global facing city.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP1
programme.desc: California has one of the largest populations of Japanese people in America. Their life here and their transition into American culture hasn’t been a smooth one. In this episode we uncover their trials, resilience and delicious healthy food.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP2

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild - Spring

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: It is now June, and the park is bathed in 17 hours of daylight. With the warm temperatures come rich pickings, but for the newborn the summer months are crucial as they learn to fight, find food and avoid predators.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Feed The Zoo

programme.desc: Kazuya asks Ruka to be her real girlfriend while at work, but is flustered when he spots Chizuru and Mami together.

programme.title: The Traveller: Thief In The Night
programme.desc: Marion was kidnapped on her 8th birthday in Vendee. 29 years later, Judge Elgouarch asked Bareski to resume the investigation because a letter of remorse from the assassin surfaced. Judge Elgouarch’s late father was the investigator of the case then.

programme.title: Wajma, An Afghan Love Story
programme.desc: In conservative Kabul, young Wajma discovers she is pregnant out of wedlock. Her boyfriend denies paternity and her father locks her up for being a disgrace. Driven by desperation, Wajma takes extreme measures forcing everyone to re-think their actions.

programme.title: Abandoned Skies
programme.desc: A cargo plane pilot is trapped alone with his plane in Earth orbit due to a nuclear war. Until one day he found someone else’s connection in space.

programme.title: Murder On Omaha Beach
programme.desc: An American veteran is found tied to a pole in his uniform on a landing beach, allegedly executed “as an example”. Captain Eloise has to overcome personal grievances and work with her estranged father, a WWII expert, on the perplexing case.

programme.title: The Broken Glass Theory
programme.desc: Insurance claims investigator Claudio finds himself in a never-ending nightmare in a small town. For what seemed like a simple job, Claudio's task now involves racing against the clock to discover the identity of the worst serial arsonist he has yet seen.

programme.title: The Traveller: Killer Town
programme.desc: Bareski arrives in a tiny village in the Vosges to investigate the disappearance of a young woman. This disappearance reminds him of the unsolved violent murders of the young Scal family six years ago which caused many inhabitants to flee the village.

programme.title: Khutulun: The Wrestling Princess
programme.desc: Princess Khutulun, a formidable Mongol warrior descended from Genghis Khan, has her marriage ambushed by an assassin who steals the Golden Sutra. Vowing revenge, Khutulun and her clan set out on an epic journey to retrieve the sacred text and restore peace.

programme.title: A Son
programme.desc: A family’s holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10-year-old son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a long-buried secret.

programme.title: Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: A successful and dashing young man whose life of one-night stands seems to be going great until a teenybopper, claiming to be his daughter, knocks on his door.

programme.title: Av é
programme.desc: While hitchhiking from Sofia to Ruse, Kamen meets Avé, a 17-year-old runaway girl. A compulsive liar, Avé keeps inventing new identities and backstories, which threaten to get Kamen deeper and deeper into trouble.

programme.title: Games People Play
programme.desc: An old group of friends gathers to celebrate Mitzi’s surprise birthday party over a nostalgic weekend at an idyllic seaside villa – just like they used to do as teenagers. Mitzi sets off a game that brings old feelings and power dynamics to the surface.

programme.title: My Son (OTO)
programme.desc: When photographer Marlene's son Jason faces a life-altering skateboarding accident, their journey to healing takes unexpected turns. As they travel from Berlin to Switzerland, Jason slowly convinces his mother that life takes detours.

programme.title: Road To Your Heart (OTO)
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: Such Is Life
programme.desc: A genre bending story consisting of dark comedy, tragic comedy and drama that focuses on themes of life and death, young and old, authority, ethics and values. Jonathan, a young undertaker gets schooled in his new job by Dennis, a veteran mortician.

programme.title: Just Like A Woman
programme.desc: Two women travel from Chicago to Santa Fe to escape their suffocating lives. Marilyn dreams of winning a contest held by a famous belly dancing company, while her friend, Mona, has a darker secret.

programme.title: King Of The Belgians
programme.desc: King Nicolas II of the Belgians is on a state visit to Istanbul when his country falls apart. With a solar storm shutting down air travel and communications, he must travel by road across the Balkans to save his country.
